project_path.ethereum-contracts: contracts/Audit Report - Animoca Core Library Extension [18/ethereum-contracts

findings.title: TokenMetadataResolverRandomizedReveal.sol: Function _requestReveal() does not revert on RevealStatus.Requested
findings.description: The _requestReveal() function only reverts on RevealStatus.Revealed, but does not revert on RevealStatus.Requested, leading to potential loss of funds for users requesting multiple reveals.
